name: Readytech
title: Engineering Lead
description: Leading engineering team for student management system serving Australia's largest universities and TAFEs

Integrated multiple payment gateways for automated enrollment workflows
Reduced error rates using comprehensive monitoring (Rollbar, Datadog)

name: Reinteractive

name: DashBid Media

Created Treasure Data and RedShift big data services queries to feed our database

name: XL Solutions
title: Web Developer

Full implementation and maintenance of marketplaces with millions of items parsed from XMLs or Json APIs loaded to ElasticSearch
Ported legacy applications from Ruby 1.8 and Rails 2.3 to Ruby 2 and Rails 4

name: Kissy
